name: Зубная паста Aquafresh Total Care 3 освежающая мята 100мл
ingredients: Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Glycerin, Pentasodium Triphosphate, PEG-6, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma, Alumina, Xanthan Gum, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Titanium Dioxide, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan), Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, Sodium Hydroxide, Limonene, CI 73360, CI 74260, CI 74160.
